Name: My Little Dog Adventure
About the game: In My Little Dog Adventure you play as a little dog that discovers the world on its mission to find its way back home. It's a short emotional story-driven exploration game that will keep you interested with an immersive story and lovable characters. What to expect? A sweet little story about a lovable dog and friendship Story-driven gameplay and puzzle elements Changing perspectives in storytelling and gameplay Several huge environments are waiting to be explored Many secrets that are hidden and are waiting to be discovered Experience the world as a dog Become friends with other animals A lot of fun and emotions are waiting for you
